name: Tenyi Spirit - Mula Adhara
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned and you have 2 or more Wyrm monsters in your GY and/or banishment: You can add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Tenyi Spirit - Mula Adhara" once per turn. This card gains these effects while a face-up non-Effect Monster is on the field.
● Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
● Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.
● Can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.
